# isVertical

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value indicating whether the font is a vertical font.

## Declaration

```swift
var isVertical: Bool { get }
```

## Discussion

The value in this property is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] for a vertical font or [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false] otherwise.

## Vertical Fonts

- **vertical**: A vertical version of the font.
